name: Simple Chicken Fajita Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 sachet Old el paso spice mix for fajitas
1 bag salad leaf mix (of your choice)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the chicken, capsicum and onions into thin strips. Mushrooms can be cut into half.
Add a tbs of oil into a pan, and add the chicken and fajita mix and stir fry until it's cooked.

Add in the onions, capsicum and mushroom into the pan and mix well. Add 1 tablespoon of soy sauce as well. You would want to stir fry them until the chicken gets a nice char on it. That's where the flavour is!

Once they're cooked through, take them out in a separate container. And start prepping the salad. Put some salad mix on a plate, add the chicken fajitas on top, and squeeze a slice of lemon. Add some caesar salad dressing (optional). Now mix well and enjoy!
